biotools.summary: Data resource collecting taxonomic composition and related metadata of > 2300 food and food-related samples. Data were produced according to a standardized pipeline and each sample is identified according the FoodEx2 classification (developed by the European Food Safety Authority to facilitate the comparison among different studies).

bioschemas.name: FoodMicrobionet
